# Git 
- create repo in git
- open terminal
- change to working dir on computer
- git init
- git pull https://github.com/syrindi/newpack
    - pulls files from the git directory
- Make changes
- git add -A
- git commit -m "message"
- git remote add origin https://github.com/syrindi/newpack
- git push -u originx master
